_project.description: 100% Route using Great Eagle Bow with WMC
_project.name: 100% OmeGEB

Head through unloaded gate.notes: Drop 5 Branches, and get 5 Bomb Arrows and Falcon Bow while waiting for cutscene

Kill Lizalfos for parts.comment: Lizalfos Tail, Lizalfos Talon, Lizalfos Horn

Cook food.comment: 5 Lotus Seeds in one dish, 5 Durians in another, 1 Endura Carrot on its own

3 Ancient Arrows.comment: Eat speed food and hearty food

Dinraal's Fang.comment: Run out the top and windbomb

_Korok::X13.comment: Grab egg behind guardian to use

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.comment: Missing Lizalfos parts? Can kill one here

_Equipment::Shield<Hylian Shield>.comment: Get the shield and warp out

Kill 1-3 .enemy(Stalkers).notes: Looking for 0-3 Screws, 2 Spring and 1 Shaft. Pick up a Core if you get one. Do not pick up extra.

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Skip Ancient Core if you already have one
